page.title: 10AN INTERVIEW WITH MRS ROZIER
page.content: Mrs.Rozia was very nice she said come in and we said thankyou very much. The first question was can you tell us a bit about the history of Icomb. the church was built about 1200 years ago then we asked which school she went to.she used to live at chelnham. she went to a school called glouster road. is there a school in Icomb there used to be a school in Icomb but that closed down in 1963. The school has been turned into a house. she came to Icomb in 1948 the house was finised about 8 years ago her husband made the house in about 1977. They used to have a cat. she likes living there very much. There transport is a car she is the school govaner and so is my Dad.
